title: Auto Banned by Chat Filter
body:
**Chat Log That Triggered Permanent Suspension**
> Game 1
Pre-Game
PentaKill Guy: so is ur dads pornhub history
In-Game
PentaKill Guy: you know what I dont get
PentaKill Guy: why can we say %%%%%% in chat
PentaKill Guy: and still get banned for it
PentaKill Guy: Look
PentaKill Guy: %%%%%%
PentaKill Guy: we can say it
PentaKill Guy: but its bannable
PentaKill Guy: like why let us say it
PentaKill Guy: AM I THE ONLY WOKE %%%%% HERE?
PentaKill Guy: nasus b
PentaKill Guy: nasus b care
PentaKill Guy: he got duo now
PentaKill Guy: i need to get laid
PentaKill Guy: ward
PentaKill Guy: someone ward barn
PentaKill Guy: why do u focus singed
PentaKill Guy: makes no sense

Hey, you guys can call me Pentakill Guy.  I just got permanently banned for using the N word in chat. I made a statement about the use of bannable words in the chat system, despite the term being flagged by Riot as a bannable word. I essentially got perma banned for saying:

"Hey, we can banned for saying X but Riot still lets us use X in chat. Isn't that weird?"

I can understand if I got a suspension or a warning to not use these terms in chat, but perma banning me over this seems pretty extreme. It's honestly really depressing because I've changed my entire behaviour since my last suspension. I've turned from being a toxic, malicious individual with no regard of other players feelings and time to actually being one of those guys who says things like "It's all good guys, we can get them next time."

Riot, look at my chat logs. Other then light teasing or jests, I haven't provoked or inflicted any kind of emotional pain or trauma onto anyone in this game. I've changed completely as a League of Legends player. I didn't even intend to push my boundaries or anything with that statement. I was just making an observation and I really didn't know or think it would end in a permanent suspension to point out a bit of irony in the game chat. I'm really sorry if I still caused trauma or emotional suffering with that statement. I had no intention of being toxic, nor did I have any intention of dehumanizing anyone.

replies.body: _Yes let me say this bannable word a bunch of times. Surely nothing bad will happen._

Perma banned and getting suspended are two very different punishments. Ostracizing me from the community over this is pretty extreme considering no one was targeted and no one's feelings or character was even mentioned in the statement. I could've used the F word instead and it would've held the same merit.

How about the next time you go into the mall you yell out that word a few times. Surely since you're not targeting anyone nothing bad will happen to you right? Do it on the street as well, maybe on the bus or at the local basketball court.
